name: Avc rebuild
body:
I am going to attempt to rebuild AVC maybe SAC for tfc steam and hopefully rebuild for tf2 with help of pre-existing open source mods, anyone interested in teaching/showing me some things to help out the process that would be most appreciated... worth karma pts for your life im sure. :D 
if you want to take control then do so on your own cppu and repo
google: AVC, AVC/SAC, TheSillyZone, Avatar-x, Shoytl, -shoytl-, mona , jinto , syune ,jinto syune, TFC,
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
